text: God... you dim-witted racists make my head hurt. ¬†Brown people are in the world. ¬†Get over it, or GTFO. ¬†If you knew anything about science, you would know that "white" skin is a fairly recent mutation. ¬†Google "Caucasian appearance gene". ¬†Modern estimates put the percentage of "White people" in the world somewhere around 10 - 20%. ¬†It's hard to say exactly, because science have realized that there are no clear lines between races. ¬†It's a gradient of genetics, not distinct categories (regardless of what you tell yourself at night before you go to sleep).  Although, judging by the comments here, I don't have high hopes for your ability to reason intelligently or to even consider actual science. ¬†You all sound like a bunch of a high functioning retards with all this talk about "race mixing" and "racial identity". ¬† Have you ever even cracked a single book on Genetics or even just Biology??  Your deliberate and willful ignorance is so profound, there is no point in trying to even help you come to a rational conclusion. ¬†I'm sorry that you never had the opportunity to unlearn the stupid you you've been brainwashed to believe. ¬†  Oh, and before you get your panties in a bunch, I'm white - born in Germany. ¬†Military family now living in the U.S. ¬†Maybe you pansies should join the military for a bit. ¬†In war, you don't care what color the guy behind you is... all you care about is what kind of man he is and if he's got what it takes to watch your back.  ¬†

author: Ken Johnston

text: Great, another story of the white savior coming in to make things better for these poor unfortunate "blacks". SMH. ¬†This story has been told many times over i.e. The Blind Side, Dangerous Minds, The Help, Cool Runnings, Radio, (and if you contextualize it, even Avatar) etc. and it serves as just another subtle way white plight stretches its arms to cover up the supremacy complex it so wrongly has. ¬†While it is great to see more faces of color on the big screen and in mass media, at what cost is my main question? ¬†Can anyone recount the last movie that hit the box office where a young single black man adopted a troubled disenfranchised white girl to give her a better way of life and take her off the streets away from her drug addict father/mother? I'll happily wait.... No rush, keep looking... [insert Jeopardy theme music]... Yes, I know, this is a hard one huh... Oh no, time is running out quickly... Ok, times up. Guess what, 'The White Savior Complex' is real and its riddled with racism. ¬†Now I know your white guilt may lend you to think otherwise but movies like these are problematic and continually paint a (false) picture of white exceptionalism. ¬†I am sure that my comment will receive hates/dislikes but, ignorant and uneducated people tend to go into defense/hate mode when they do not understand something instead of simply researching and drawing their own opinions. ¬†God knows, I whole heartedly disagree with this movies and its push for 'The White Savior Complex' so, I did my research to perhaps see if I were wrong. ¬†What do you know, I am not only not wrong, my feelings regarding movies like these are ubiquitous to those who are not thoughtless drones and victims of this idea of 'The White Savior'.¬†

text: Looks like a really good movie. Defiantly going to check it out!! Sad how its 2015 and were still dealing with racial tensions and stereotypes. Being a white person, I don't experience it the way they do so I can't speak much on the issue, as I don't see anything from their perspective ...but to the haters and racist's, their opinion doesn't mean a damn thing. It only shows what little confidence they have in their own selves. Another person should never bother you personally, unless your being disrespected or challenged ,but if they aren't affecting you personally, then get the f*k over it and stop being so damn ignorant. Btw, we all experience judgment and disrespect at one point or another. Black, gay, handicap, obese, blind, poor..whatever it is, everyone experiences it at some degree or another,so if you being judged, disrespected, sterotyped.. Then it just means your human because there's always that jerk somewhere waiting to criticize and bash. So f*k em all,!
